title: Update Microsoft.VisualStudio.Setup.Configuration.Interop
body:
We're [currently using](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/a307595c76336c335c6a87613be16e5f7c6e5883/src/Build/project.json#L5) `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Setup.Configuration.Interop` `1.2.304-preview5`.

We should move to the latest: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.VisualStudio.Setup.Configuration.Interop/
